text:
[Verse]
Colors in the sky
Raindrops falling down
Puddles shining bright
Splashing all around

[Verse 2]
Feet upon the ground
Rhythms in the air
Spinning all around
Music everywhere

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy and pain
We'll never be the same
Dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Laughing side by side
Clouds are rolling by
Hearts are open wide
Stars within the sky

[Bridge]
Hands are reaching out
Movements in the night
Love without a doubt
Underneath the light

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy and pain
We'll never be the same
Dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
